←👦🏻🧍🏽
my son walk
{{c1::meus}} fīlius ambulō
👦🏻🧍🏽👍🏼
my son am well
{{c1::meus}} fīlius bonum sum
🫸🏼→👦🏻🧍🏽
he pushes my son
is {{c1::meum}} fīlium trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽
he sees my son
is {{c1::meum}} fīlium videt
👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
the son of my son
fīlius {{c1::meō}} fīliī
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽
he walks away from my son
is ab {{c1::meō}} fīliō ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽
he walks by my son
is apud {{c1::meum}} fīlium ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽
he walks to my son
is ad {{c1::meum}} fīlium ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽↙
he walks along my son
is per {{c1::meum}} fīlium ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [in the presence of] my son
is coram {{c1::meō}} fīliō labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [by using the presence of] my son
is propter {{c1::meum}} fīlium labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽➕
he works [with the aid of] my son
is cum {{c1::meō}} fīliō labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [in the absence of] my son
is sine {{c1::meō}} fīliō labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [in the interest of] my son
is {{c1::None}} fīliō labōrat
💬👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽❤️
he works [by appealing to the interest of] my son
is per {{c1::meum}} fīlium labōrat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️←👦🏻🧍🏽
he walks in the company of my son
is inter {{c1::meum}} fīlium ambulat
←👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
my sons walk
{{c1::meus}} fīliī ambulāmus
👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽👍🏼
my sons are well
{{c1::meus}} fīliī bonum sumus
🫸🏼→👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
he pushes my sons
is {{c1::meum}} fīliōs trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
he sees my sons
is {{c1::meum}} fīliōs videt
👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
the son of my sons
fīlius {{c1::meīs}} fīliōrum
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
he walks away from my sons
is ab {{c1::meīs}} fīliīs ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
he walks by my sons
is apud {{c1::meum}} fīliōs ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
he walks to my sons
is ad {{c1::meum}} fīliōs ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽↙
he walks along my sons
is per {{c1::meum}} fīliōs ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [in the presence of] my sons
is coram {{c1::meīs}} fīliīs labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [by using the presence of] my sons
is propter {{c1::meum}} fīliōs labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽➕
he works [with the aid of] my sons
is cum {{c1::meīs}} fīliīs labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [in the absence of] my sons
is sine {{c1::meīs}} fīliīs labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [in the interest of] my sons
is {{c1::None}} fīliīs labōrat
💬👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽❤️
he works [by appealing to the interest of] my sons
is per {{c1::meum}} fīliōs labōrat

he walks in the company of my sons

he works [by appealing to the interest of] your daughters
is per {{c1::tuam}} fīliās labōrat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️←👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he walks in the company of your daughters
is inter {{c1::tuam}} fīliās ambulat
←👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
his son walk
{{c1::eius}} fīlius ambulō
👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️👍🏼
his son am well
{{c1::eius}} fīlius bonum sum
🫸🏼→👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he pushes his son
is {{c1::eius}} fīlium trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he sees his son
is {{c1::eius}} fīlium videt
👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
the son of his son
fīlius {{c1::eius}} fīliī
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he walks away from his son
is ab {{c1::eius}} fīliō ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he walks by his son
is apud {{c1::eius}} fīlium ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he walks to his son
is ad {{c1::eius}} fīlium ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️↙
he walks along his son
is per {{c1::eius}} fīlium ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he works [in the presence of] his son
is coram {{c1::eius}} fīliō labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he works [by using the presence of] his son
is propter {{c1::eius}} fīlium labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️➕
he works [with the aid of] his son
is cum {{c1::eius}} fīliō labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he works [in the absence of] his son
is sine {{c1::eius}} fīliō labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he works [in the interest of] his son
is {{c1::None}} fīliō labōrat
💬👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️❤️
he works [by appealing to the interest of] his son
is per {{c1::eius}} fīlium labōrat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️←👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he walks in the company of his son
is inter {{c1::eius}} fīlium ambulat
←👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
his sons walk
{{c1::eius}} fīliī ambulāmus
👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️👍🏼
his sons are well
{{c1::eius}} fīliī bonum sumus
🫸🏼→👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he pushes his sons
is {{c1::eius}} fīliōs trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he sees his sons
is {{c1::eius}} fīliōs videt
👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
the son of his sons
fīlius {{c1::eius}} fīliōrum
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he walks away from his sons
is ab {{c1::eius}} fīliīs ambulat

🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks by her daughters
is apud {{c1::eius}} fīliās ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks to her daughters
is ad {{c1::eius}} fīliās ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️↙
he walks along her daughters
is per {{c1::eius}} fīliās ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [in the presence of] her daughters
is coram {{c1::eius}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [by using the presence of] her daughters
is propter {{c1::eius}} fīliās labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️➕
he works [with the aid of] her daughters
is cum {{c1::eius}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [in the absence of] her daughters
is sine {{c1::eius}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [in the interest of] her daughters
is {{c1::None}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
💬👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️❤️
he works [by appealing to the interest of] her daughters
is per {{c1::eius}} fīliās labōrat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️←👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks in the company of her daughters
is inter {{c1::eius}} fīliās ambulat
←👦🏻🐍
its son walk
{{c1::eius}} fīlius ambulō
👦🏻🐍👍🏼
its son am well
{{c1::eius}} fīlius bonum sum
🫸🏼→👦🏻🐍
he pushes its son
is {{c1::eius}} fīlium trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🐍
he sees its son
is {{c1::eius}} fīlium videt
👦🏻👦🏻🐍
the son of its son
fīlius {{c1::eius}} fīliī
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🐍
he walks away from its son
is ab {{c1::eius}} fīliō ambulat

he walks by its son
is apud {{c1::eius}} fīlium ambulat

he walks to its son

he walks along its son

👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🐍
he works [in the presence of] its son
is coram {{c1::eius}} fīliō labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🐍
he works [by using the presence of] its son
is propter {{c1::eius}} fīlium labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🐍➕
he works [with the aid of] its son
is cum {{c1::eius}} fīliō labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🐍
he works [in the absence of] its son
is sine {{c1::eius}} fīliō labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🐍
he works [in the interest of] its son
is {{c1::None}} fīliō labōrat

is per {{c1::eius}} fīlium labōrat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️←👦🏻🐍
he walks in the company of its son
is inter {{c1::eius}} fīlium ambulat
←👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🐍
its sons walk
{{c1::eius}} fīliī ambulāmus
👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🐍👍🏼
its sons are well
{{c1::eius}} fīliī bonum sumus
🫸🏼→👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🐍
he pushes its sons

is {{c1::nostram}} fīliās trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he sees all of our daughters
is {{c1::nostram}} fīliās videt
👦🏻👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
the son of all of our daughters
fīlius {{c1::nostrīs}} fīliārum
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he walks away from all of our daughters
is ab {{c1::nostrīs}} fīliīs|fīliābus ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he walks by all of our daughters
is apud {{c1::nostram}} fīliās ambulat

he walks to all of our daughters
is ad {{c1::nostram}} fīliās ambulat

he walks along all of our daughters
is per {{c1::nostram}} fīliās ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he works [in the presence of] all of our daughters
is coram {{c1::nostrīs}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he works [by using the presence of] all of our daughters
is propter {{c1::nostram}} fīliās labōrat

he works [with the aid of] all of our daughters
is cum {{c1::nostrīs}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat

he works [in the absence of] all of our daughters

is {{c1::None}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat

all of your son walk
{{c1::vester}} fīlius ambulō

all of your son am well
{{c1::vester}} fīlius bonum sum

he works [by appealing to the interest of] "their sons
is per {{c1::eōrum}} fīliōs labōrat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️←👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼🧍🏼🧍🏼
he walks in the company of "their sons
is inter {{c1::eōrum}} fīliōs ambulat
←👧🏻🧍🏼🧍🏼🧍🏼
"their daughter walk
{{c1::eōrum}} fīlia ambulō
👧🏻🧍🏼🧍🏼🧍🏼👍🏼
"their daughter am well
{{c1::eōrum}} fīlia bonum sum
🫸🏼→👧🏻🧍🏼🧍🏼🧍🏼
he pushes "their daughter
is {{c1::eōrum}} fīliam trūdit

he sees "their daughter
is {{c1::eōrum}} fīliam videt

the son of "their daughter
fīlius {{c1::eōrum}} fīliae

he works [by using the presence of] their♀ daughters
is propter {{c1::eārum}} fīliās labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️➕
he works [with the aid of] their♀ daughters
is cum {{c1::eārum}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [in the absence of] their♀ daughters
is sine {{c1::eārum}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [in the interest of] their♀ daughters
is {{c1::None}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
💬👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️❤️
he works [by appealing to the interest of] their♀ daughters
is per {{c1::eārum}} fīliās labōrat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️←👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks in the company of their♀ daughters
is inter {{c1::eārum}} fīliās ambulat
←👦🏻🧍🏽
my son walk
{{c1::meus}} fīlius ambulās
👦🏻🧍🏽👍🏼
my son are well
{{c1::meus}} fīlius bonum es
🫸🏼→👦🏻🧍🏽
he pushes my son
is {{c1::meum}} fīlium trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽
he sees my son
is {{c1::meum}} fīlium videt
👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
the son of my son
fīlius {{c1::meō}} fīliī
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽
he walks away from my son
is ab {{c1::meō}} fīliō ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽
he walks by my son
is apud {{c1::meum}} fīlium ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽
he walks to my son
is ad {{c1::meum}} fīlium ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽↙
he walks along my son
is per {{c1::meum}} fīlium ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [in the presence of] my son
is coram {{c1::meō}} fīliō labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [by using the presence of] my son
is propter {{c1::meum}} fīlium labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽➕
he works [with the aid of] my son
is cum {{c1::meō}} fīliō labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [in the absence of] my son
is sine {{c1::meō}} fīliō labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [in the interest of] my son
is {{c1::None}} fīliō labōrat

is per {{c1::meum}} fīlium labōrat

he walks in the company of my son

←👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
my sons walk
{{c1::meus}} fīliī ambulātis

my sons are well
{{c1::meus}} fīliī bonum estis

is {{c1::meum}} fīliōs trūdit

the son of my sons
fīlius {{c1::meīs}} fīliōrum

is apud {{c1::tuam}} fīliās ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he walks to your daughters
is ad {{c1::tuam}} fīliās ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️↙
he walks along your daughters
is per {{c1::tuam}} fīliās ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he works [in the presence of] your daughters
is coram {{c1::tuīs}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he works [by using the presence of] your daughters
is propter {{c1::tuam}} fīliās labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️➕
he works [with the aid of] your daughters
is cum {{c1::tuīs}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he works [in the absence of] your daughters
is sine {{c1::tuīs}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he works [in the interest of] your daughters
is {{c1::None}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
💬👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️❤️
he works [by appealing to the interest of] your daughters
is per {{c1::tuam}} fīliās labōrat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️←👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he walks in the company of your daughters
is inter {{c1::tuam}} fīliās ambulat
←👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
his son walk
{{c1::eius}} fīlius ambulās
👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️👍🏼
his son are well
{{c1::eius}} fīlius bonum es
🫸🏼→👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he pushes his son
is {{c1::eius}} fīlium trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he sees his son
is {{c1::eius}} fīlium videt
👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
the son of his son
fīlius {{c1::eius}} fīliī
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he walks away from his son
is ab {{c1::eius}} fīliō ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he walks by his son
is apud {{c1::eius}} fīlium ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he walks to his son
is ad {{c1::eius}} fīlium ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️↙
he walks along his son
is per {{c1::eius}} fīlium ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he works [in the presence of] his son
is coram {{c1::eius}} fīliō labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he works [by using the presence of] his son
is propter {{c1::eius}} fīlium labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️➕
he works [with the aid of] his son
is cum {{c1::eius}} fīliō labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he works [in the absence of] his son
is sine {{c1::eius}} fīliō labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he works [in the interest of] his son
is {{c1::None}} fīliō labōrat
💬👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️❤️
he works [by appealing to the interest of] his son
is per {{c1::eius}} fīlium labōrat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️←👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he walks in the company of his son
is inter {{c1::eius}} fīlium ambulat
←👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
his sons walk
{{c1::eius}} fīliī ambulātis
👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️👍🏼
his sons are well
{{c1::eius}} fīliī bonum estis
🫸🏼→👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he pushes his sons
is {{c1::eius}} fīliōs trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he sees his sons
is {{c1::eius}} fīliōs videt
👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
the son of his sons
fīlius {{c1::eius}} fīliōrum
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️

is sine {{c1::eius}} fīliā labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [in the interest of] her daughter
is {{c1::None}} fīliae labōrat
💬👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️❤️
he works [by appealing to the interest of] her daughter
is per {{c1::eius}} fīliam labōrat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️←👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks in the company of her daughter
is inter {{c1::eius}} fīliam ambulat
←👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
her daughters walk
{{c1::eius}} fīliae ambulātis
👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️👍🏼
her daughters are well
{{c1::eius}} fīliae bonum estis
🫸🏼→👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he pushes her daughters
is {{c1::eius}} fīliās trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he sees her daughters
is {{c1::eius}} fīliās videt
👦🏻👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
the son of her daughters
fīlius {{c1::eius}} fīliārum
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks away from her daughters
is ab {{c1::eius}} fīliīs|fīliābus ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks by her daughters
is apud {{c1::eius}} fīliās ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks to her daughters
is ad {{c1::eius}} fīliās ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️↙
he walks along her daughters
is per {{c1::eius}} fīliās ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [in the presence of] her daughters
is coram {{c1::eius}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [by using the presence of] her daughters
is propter {{c1::eius}} fīliās labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️➕

is cum {{c1::eius}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat

{{c1::eius}} fīlius ambulās

its son are well
{{c1::eius}} fīlius bonum es

he pushes its son
is {{c1::eius}} fīlium trūdit

he sees its son
is {{c1::eius}} fīlium videt

the son of its son
fīlius {{c1::eius}} fīliī

he walks away from its son
is ab {{c1::eius}} fīliō ambulat

←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🐍↙

is coram {{c1::nostrae}} fīliā labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he works [by using the presence of] all of our daughter
is propter {{c1::nostram}} fīliam labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽➕
he works [with the aid of] all of our daughter
is cum {{c1::nostrae}} fīliā labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he works [in the absence of] all of our daughter
is sine {{c1::nostrae}} fīliā labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he works [in the interest of] all of our daughter
is {{c1::None}} fīliae labōrat
💬👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽❤️
he works [by appealing to the interest of] all of our daughter
is per {{c1::nostram}} fīliam labōrat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️←👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he walks in the company of all of our daughter
is inter {{c1::nostram}} fīliam ambulat
←👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
all of our daughters walk
{{c1::nostra}} fīliae ambulātis
👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽👍🏼
all of our daughters are well
{{c1::nostra}} fīliae bonum estis
🫸🏼→👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he pushes all of our daughters
is {{c1::nostram}} fīliās trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he sees all of our daughters
is {{c1::nostram}} fīliās videt
👦🏻👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
the son of all of our daughters
fīlius {{c1::nostrīs}} fīliārum
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he walks away from all of our daughters
is ab {{c1::nostrīs}} fīliīs|fīliābus ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he walks by all of our daughters
is apud {{c1::nostram}} fīliās ambulat

all of your son walk
{{c1::vester}} fīlius ambulās
👦🏻🧍🏾‍♀️🧍🏾‍♀️🧍🏾‍♀️👍🏼
all of your son are well
{{c1::vester}} fīlius bonum es

he pushes all of your son
is {{c1::vestrum}} fīlium trūdit

the son of all of your son

is coram {{c1::eōrum}} fīliīs labōrat

←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks away from their♀ daughters
is ab {{c1::eārum}} fīliīs|fīliābus ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks by their♀ daughters
is apud {{c1::eārum}} fīliās ambulat

he walks to their♀ daughters
is ad {{c1::eārum}} fīliās ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️↙
he walks along their♀ daughters
is per {{c1::eārum}} fīliās ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [in the presence of] their♀ daughters
is coram {{c1::eārum}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [by using the presence of] their♀ daughters
is propter {{c1::eārum}} fīliās labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️➕
he works [with the aid of] their♀ daughters
is cum {{c1::eārum}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [in the absence of] their♀ daughters
is sine {{c1::eārum}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat

he works [in the interest of] their♀ daughters
is {{c1::None}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat

←👦🏻🧍🏽
my son walks
{{c1::meus}} fīlius ambulat
👦🏻🧍🏽👍🏼
my son is well
{{c1::meus}} fīlius bonum est
🫸🏼→👦🏻🧍🏽
he pushes my son
is {{c1::meum}} fīlium trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽
he sees my son
is {{c1::meum}} fīlium videt
👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏽
the son of my son
fīlius {{c1::meō}} fīliī
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽
he walks away from my son
is ab {{c1::meō}} fīliō ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽
he walks by my son
is apud {{c1::meum}} fīlium ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽
he walks to my son
is ad {{c1::meum}} fīlium ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏽↙
he walks along my son
is per {{c1::meum}} fīlium ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [in the presence of] my son
is coram {{c1::meō}} fīliō labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [by using the presence of] my son
is propter {{c1::meum}} fīlium labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽➕
he works [with the aid of] my son
is cum {{c1::meō}} fīliō labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👦🏻🧍🏽
he works [in the absence of] my son
is sine {{c1::meō}} fīliō labōrat

he works [in the interest of] my son

←🚶🏼‍♂️️←👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he walks in the company of your daughter
is inter {{c1::tuam}} fīliam ambulat
←👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
your daughters walk
{{c1::tua}} fīliae ambulant
👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️👍🏼
your daughters are well
{{c1::tua}} fīliae bonum sunt
🫸🏼→👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he pushes your daughters
is {{c1::tuam}} fīliās trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he sees your daughters
is {{c1::tuam}} fīliās videt
👦🏻👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
the son of your daughters
fīlius {{c1::tuīs}} fīliārum
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he walks away from your daughters
is ab {{c1::tuīs}} fīliīs|fīliābus ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he walks by your daughters
is apud {{c1::tuam}} fīliās ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he walks to your daughters
is ad {{c1::tuam}} fīliās ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️↙
he walks along your daughters
is per {{c1::tuam}} fīliās ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he works [in the presence of] your daughters
is coram {{c1::tuīs}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he works [by using the presence of] your daughters
is propter {{c1::tuam}} fīliās labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️➕
he works [with the aid of] your daughters
is cum {{c1::tuīs}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he works [in the absence of] your daughters
is sine {{c1::tuīs}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️
he works [in the interest of] your daughters
is {{c1::None}} fīliīs|fīliābus labōrat

he walks in the company of your daughters
is inter {{c1::tuam}} fīliās ambulat
←👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
his son walks
{{c1::eius}} fīlius ambulat
👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️👍🏼
his son is well
{{c1::eius}} fīlius bonum est
🫸🏼→👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he pushes his son
is {{c1::eius}} fīlium trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he sees his son
is {{c1::eius}} fīlium videt
👦🏻👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
the son of his son
fīlius {{c1::eius}} fīliī
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he walks away from his son
is ab {{c1::eius}} fīliō ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he walks by his son
is apud {{c1::eius}} fīlium ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👦🏻🧍🏼‍♂️️
he walks to his son
is ad {{c1::eius}} fīlium ambulat

he walks along his son
is per {{c1::eius}} fīlium ambulat

👦🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
the son of her daughter
fīlius {{c1::eius}} fīliae
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks away from her daughter
is ab {{c1::eius}} fīliā ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks by her daughter
is apud {{c1::eius}} fīliam ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks to her daughter
is ad {{c1::eius}} fīliam ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️↙
he walks along her daughter
is per {{c1::eius}} fīliam ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [in the presence of] her daughter
is coram {{c1::eius}} fīliā labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [by using the presence of] her daughter
is propter {{c1::eius}} fīliam labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️➕
he works [with the aid of] her daughter
is cum {{c1::eius}} fīliā labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [in the absence of] her daughter
is sine {{c1::eius}} fīliā labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he works [in the interest of] her daughter
is {{c1::None}} fīliae labōrat
💬👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️❤️
he works [by appealing to the interest of] her daughter
is per {{c1::eius}} fīliam labōrat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️←👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
he walks in the company of her daughter
is inter {{c1::eius}} fīliam ambulat
←👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏼‍♀️
her daughters walk
{{c1::eius}} fīliae ambulant

her daughters are well
{{c1::eius}} fīliae bonum sunt

is {{c1::eius}} fīliās trūdit

🫸🏼→👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he pushes all of our daughter
is {{c1::nostram}} fīliam trūdit
💁🏼‍♂️️👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he sees all of our daughter
is {{c1::nostram}} fīliam videt
👦🏻👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
the son of all of our daughter
fīlius {{c1::nostrae}} fīliae
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he walks away from all of our daughter
is ab {{c1::nostrae}} fīliā ambulat
🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he walks by all of our daughter
is apud {{c1::nostram}} fīliam ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he walks to all of our daughter
is ad {{c1::nostram}} fīliam ambulat
←🚶🏼‍♂️️👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽↙
he walks along all of our daughter
is per {{c1::nostram}} fīliam ambulat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he works [in the presence of] all of our daughter
is coram {{c1::nostrae}} fīliā labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he works [by using the presence of] all of our daughter
is propter {{c1::nostram}} fīliam labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽➕
he works [with the aid of] all of our daughter
is cum {{c1::nostrae}} fīliā labōrat
👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he works [in the absence of] all of our daughter
is sine {{c1::nostrae}} fīliā labōrat
❤️👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻🧍🏽🧍🏽🧍🏽
he works [in the interest of] all of our daughter
is {{c1::None}} fīliae labōrat

{{c1::nostra}} fīliae ambulant

❤️👨🏼‍🌾👧🏻👧🏻👧🏻🧍🏾‍♀️🧍🏾‍♀️🧍🏾‍♀️

is inter {{c1::eōrum}} fīlium ambulat
